fundProject.keyFundInvestmentThemes: Agri-tech and Food-tech climate ESG investments
fundProject.investmentLocation: global with a focus on Israeli nexus
fundProject.investmentObjective: NevaTeam Partners is an Agri-Food Tech Impact driven Fund with world-class knowledge and expertise that specializes in identifying and investing in cutting-edge companies and technologies, contributing to the streamlining and increase in world food production in a sustainable way

masterProject.projectNda:
Dear Smat member,


In the context of your potential investment in Project {projectName} on the SMAT Platform (the "Investment"), confidential and proprietary information is to be provided to you.


The term "Confidential Information" means, individually or collectively, by way of example but without limitation, information of any nature including economic, commercial, financial, legal, industrial or technical information, all data, figures, reports, sketches, samples, designs, photographs, drawings, financial statements, reports, studies, developments, business plans, formulae, test methods, products, product composition and/or specifications, equipment, tooling, ideas, inventions, knowhow, and more generally any and all information provided via the SMAT platform whatever its form or its media, whether or not protected by industrial or intellectual property rights, and whether or not bearing the indication "Confidential", indirectly or directly disclosed or made available to you for the purposes of the Investment.


Confidential Information does not include (i) any information which is or becomes part of the public domain, other than as a result of any breach of any confidentiality undertaking, or (ii) information which is made available to you by a third party outside the SMAT platform and is not subject to any confidentiality obligation.


By agreeing to the following non-disclosure agreement, you hereby undertake:


to use the Confidential Information for the sole purpose of determining if you wish to pursue your interest in the Investment;


to respect the strict confidentiality of the Confidential Information, using the same degree of care you are using to protect your own confidential information, and to prevent any disclosure of the Confidential Information, in whole or in part, to any third party whatsoever (except the client on behalf of which you are contemplating the Investment);


to hold and retain the Confidential Information at all times under secured conditions so as to prevent any unauthorised access, reading or copying.


In addition, you acknowledge that no licence or assignment of the Confidential Information is granted to you, either explicitly or implicitly.



You hereby acknowledge that neither SMAT nor the Issuer has undertaken to warrant the accuracy, reliability, completeness or comprehensive nature of the Confidential Information.



The undertakings contained in this confidentiality agreement shall remain in full force and effect for a period of eighteen (18) months as from the date on which it has been agreed.
masterProject.projectNdaAgreement: I agree to the term and conditions of the non-disclosure agreement regarding Project {projectName} as {todayDate}
